page_content: The page focuses on youth protection in the workplace, discussing permissible tasks and working hours for young employees.
The page provides information on procedures involving personal data within the Department for Economy, Social Affairs, and Environment.
The page discusses eco-friendly presentation surfaces for events and exhibitions, offering a PDF guide on the topic.
The page offers a downloadable PDF guide on youth protection concerning the sale of alcohol and tobacco.
The page provides various forms and guides related to military service and conscription replacement, available for download in DOCX and PDF formats.
The page discusses groundwater protection zones and offers downloadable PDF guidelines on the subject.
The page outlines the media and information regulations for the courts of the Canton of Basel-Stadt, including guidelines for media personnel.
